name: Cu Chi Tunnel By Public Bus
description:
Adventuring the most impressive tunnel in the world - the chance to understand life in the "underground city" with full facilities such as hospital, school, kitchen, meeting room.... during the Vietnam war and experiencing Ho Chi Minh City- in a truly local way.
With taking 2 buses (13 and then 79) from Ben Thanh station, you can reach to Cu Chi tunnel. It takes about 2 hours one way.The bus here really comfortable
